Projects.title: Keeper app
desc: The Keeper App is a lightweight note-taking application inspired by Google Keep. It allows users to quickly create, view, and delete notes in a clean and minimal interface.
This project is designed as a practice application for modern web development, combining a Node.js backend with a Vite + React frontend.

Projects.title: Dbank
desc: DSurv is a demo decentralized application (dApp) that allows users to claim free testnet tokens through a faucet, check account balances, and transfer tokens using Principal IDs. It is designed for experimenting with token distribution and transactions, likely on the Internet Computer Protocol (ICP), before deploying on the mainnet.
